markdownRemark.html:
What is new?

Changes included in the Open Data Hub v1.11.0 release:

  • ODH Operator

    • rolling channel (default): v1.11.0
    • fast channel(alpha): v2.3.0

  • ODH Dashboard v2.17.0-incubation

  • Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.6.0

  • ODH Notebook Controller v1.7.0-5

  • Integration of KServe manifests with new operator v0.11.1.0

  • Model Mesh Serving v0.11.1.0

  • Codeflare Operator 10db2442140

  • KubeRay 1ed78ffb2

  • TrustyAI Operator v1.11.1

NOTE: Please review the odh-operator v2.0 blog to learn more about the new DataScienceCluster CustomResourceDefinition that will be replacing the KfDef deployment method in a future release

Notable Changes

  • With the release of ODH Operator version 2.3.0 on the fast channel, the API version has been updated from v1alpha1 to v1. We strongly recommend that you carefully review the upgrade instructions before proceeding with an upgrade from v2.0.0 or v2.1.0 to v2.3.0

The following is a list of components that are available in v1.11.0 release of from operator:

Technology Version Category
Open Data Hub Dashboard v2.17.0-incubation
Open Data Hub Notebook Images v1.7.0-5
Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.6.0
Codeflare Operator main branch on commit 10db2442140
KubeRay master branch on commit 1ed78ffb2
TrustyAI Operator v1.11.1
Model Mesh Serving v0.11.1.0
Kserve v0.11.1.0

NOTE: This is the last ODH release for v1 operator. From next v2.4.0, we will only have new features and fixes included in the v2 operator.

frontmatter.preview: Open Data Hub 1.11.0 was just released
